variable.name: pramar
variable.expression: groovyScript("def result=''; def params=\"${_1}\".replaceAll('[\\\\[|\\\\]|\\\\s]', '').split(',').toList(); for(i = 0; i < params.size(); i++) {result+='* @param ' +params[i] + ((i < params.size() - 1) ? '\\n\\t' : '')}; return result", methodParameters())

template.name: vs
